frontmatter.title: Check firewall
frontmatter.description: It is vital that your devices are running a firewall, in order to prevent unauthorised access to your computer network. The options for this can be found under “Firewall and network protection”, if you are running Windows, or alternatively in the Control Panel. Take a look at this now.

frontmatter.title: Enable WiFi Protected Access and WPA2 encryption.
Manual backup to separate device, kept elsewhere
